tuv.seg: Fixed-term or specified-purpose contracts
Conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta nó sainchuspóra
• Rights of employees on fixed-term contracts
• Cearta na bhfostaithe le conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta
• Renewal of fixed-term contracts
• Athnuachan conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta
Employees on fixed-term contracts have broadly similar rights to those on open-ended contracts
Tá na cearta atá ag fostaithe ar théarma seasta cosúil le cearta atá acu siúd ar chonarthaí neamhiata
The majority of employees work under open-ended contracts of employment
Oibríonn formhór fhostaithe ar chonarthaí oibre neamhiata
In other words, the contract continues until such time as the employer or employee ends it
Sé sin, maireann an conradh go dtí go gcuireann an fostóir nó an fostaí deireadh leis
Many other employees however, work under fixed-term contracts
Oibríonn go leor fostaithe eile, áfach, ar chonarthaí atá ar théarma seasta
The term, fixed-term employee, covers employees whose contract ends on a specified date, or when a specific task is completed, or when a specific event occurs
Ciallaíonn an téarma, fostaí ar théarma seasta, go gcríochnaíonn conradh an fhostaí ar dháta áirithe, nó go gcríochnaíonn sé nuair atá tasc áirithe déanta nó imeacht áirithe tarlaithe
Generally, a fixed-term contract ends on an agreed date
Go ginearálta, críochnaíonn conradh ar théarma seasta ar dháta atá réitithe roimh réidh
The period of such a contract may range from a matter of months up to a period of a year or more
Maireann conradh dhá leithéid roinnt míonna nó bliain nó níos mó
However, a fixed-term contract can also involve a specified-purpose and so may not end on a specific date
Ach, dá mbeadh cuspóir sonrach ag baint leis an gconradh ní chríochnódh sé ar dháta a bheadh socraithe roimh réidh
Rather, it is agreed that the contract will finish when a particular stated task is completed, such as replacing an employee while she is on maternity leave
Is é an réiteach a bheadh ansin ann, áfach, ná go gcríochnódh an conradh nuair a bheadh tasc áirithe curtha i gcrích, mar shampla duine a chuir in áit fostú a bheadh ar saoire máithreachais
The expression, fixed-term contract, is used for convenience here
Úsáidtear an téarma, conradh ar théarma seasta, ar son na héascachta anseo
It also includes specified-purpose contracts
Tá conradh sainchuspóra san áireamh freisin
Rights of employees on fixed-term contracts
Cearta na bhfostaithe le conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta
Generally speaking, people employed under such contracts have the same rights as other employees
Go ginearálta, tá na cearta céanna ag fostaithe ar na conarthaí seo le haon fhostaithe eile
For example, employees with fixed-term contracts have the normal entitlement to annual leave (holidays), maternity leave, and wage slips
Mar shampla, tá na fostaithe ar théarmaí seasta i dteideal na teidlíochtaí normálta saoire bliantúil (saoire mháithreachais, agus duillíní pá
The Terms of Employment (Information) Acts 1994–2014 require that employees with a fixed-term contract get written notice of the expiry date
Faoin Acht um Théarmaí Fostaíochta (Faisnéis) 1994–2014 tá sé de dhualgas ar an bhfostóir go dtugtar dáta éaga an chonartha do na fostaithe atá ar théarmaí seasta
The Protection of Employees (Fixed-Term Work) Act 2003 applies to most employees on fixed-term contracts
Baineann An tAcht um Chosaint Fostaithe (Obair Téarma Socraithe) 2003 le formhór na bhfostaithe ar théarmaí seasta

However, it does not apply to agency workers placed by a temporary work agency at the disposition of a user enterprise or to apprentices, trainees and people in publicly-funded employment schemes such as Community Employment

Ní bhaineann sé, áfach, le hoibrithe ghníomhaíochta atá curtha ag diúscairt gnóthais úsáideora, le printísigh, daoine faoi oiliúint, agus daoine atá ag obair le scéimeanna fostaíochta atá maoinithe ag an Stát mar shampla, Fostaíocht Pobail
The Act does apply to agency workers employed directly by an employment agency
Baineann an tAcht le hoibrithe ghníomhaíochta atá fostaithe go díreach ag gníomhas fostaíochta
The Act provides that fixed-term employees may not be treated less favourably than comparable permanent employees unless the employer can objectively justify the different treatment

De réir an tAcht, níl aon chead ag fostóirí déileáil go fabhrach le fostaithe lánaimseartha thar na bhfostaithe comhchéime atá ar théarma seasta gan bheith in ann an cóireáil difriúil a chosaint go hoibiachtúil
Any justification offered cannot be connected with the fact that the employee is on a fixed-term contract
Ní féidir baint a bheith ag an bhfíréanú a thugtar leis an chúis go bhfuil an fostaí ar théarma seasta
The definition of comparable employees, the conditions attached and the enforcement mechanisms are similar to those for part-time employees
Tá an t-sainmhíniú ar fhostaithe comhchéime, na coinníollacha a bhaineann leis agus na sásra forfheidhmithe an-chosúil leo siúd atá ag fostaithe páirt-aimseartha
Only those fixed-term employees whose normal hours of work are less than 20% of the normal hours of the comparable permanent employees can be excluded from entitlement to join a pension scheme
Níl fostaithe ar théarmaí seasta a bhfuil a gnáth uaireanta oibre 20% níos lú ná gnáth uaireanta oibre fostaithe comhchéime lánaimseartha i dteideal páirt a ghlacadh i scéim pinsean
As far as is practicable, an employer is required to help a fixed-term employee to access training to enhance skills, career development and job mobility

Chomh fada agus atá indéanta, tá sé de dhualgas ar an bhfostóir cúnamh a thabhairt do fhostaí ar théarma seasta cúrsaí oiliúna a dhéanamh a chuirfeadh lena scileanna, agus a chabhródh lena bhforbairt gairme agus soghluaisteacht ó phost go chéile
Maternity leave: an employee on a fixed-term contract is entitled to full maternity leave
Saoire mháithreachais: tá fostaí ar théarmaí seasta i dteideal saoire mháithreachais iomlán
However, if her fixed-term contract ends before the last day of maternity leave, this counts as the last day of maternity leave
Áfach, má chríochnaíonn an conradh ar théarma seasta roimh an deireadh lá saoire mháithreachais, áirítear é mar an deireadh lá saoire mháithreachais
This means that if the fixed-term contract ends during maternity leave, then the employee’s contract of employment terminates on that date
Ciallaíonn sé má chríochnaíonn an conradh ar théarma seasta i rith shaoire mháithreachais, críochnaíonn conradh fostaíochta an fhostaí ar an dáta sin
This does not affect entitlement to the full 26 weeks of Maternity Benefit
Ní bhainfidh sé seo leis an teidlíocht 26 seachtain iomlán Sochar Máithreachais
An employer must provide a fixed-term employee with a written statement as soon as possible, outlining what will trigger an end to the contract
Caithfidh an fostóir ráiteas scríofa a sholáthar chomh luath agus is féidir don fhostaí atá ar théarma seasta a chuireann in iúl cad a chuirfidh deireadh leis an gconradh
That is, whether the contract will end on a specific date, following completion of a specific task or a specific event
Sé sin, an gcríochnóidh an conradh ar dháta áirithe, nuair a bheidh tasc curtha i gcrích nó imeacht thart

In addition, where an employer intends to renew a fixed-term contract, a written statement must be supplied to the fixed-term employee not later than the date of renewal, setting out the objective grounds justifying the renewal and the failure to offer an open-ended contract

Chomh maith leis sin, áit a bhfuil fostóir ag iarraidh conradh ar théarma seasta a athnuachan, caithfear ráiteas scríofa a chuir ar fáil don fhostaí atá ar théarma seasta roimh an dáta athnuachana, ag cur síos ar na fáthanna oibiachtúil leis an athnuachan agus an fáth nach bhfuil conradh neamhiata á thairiscint
Employers are obliged to inform fixed-term employees of vacancies for permanent positions
Tá sé de dhualgas ar fhostóirí na fostaithe atá ar théarma seasta a chuir ar an eolas maidir le folúntais i bpostanna lánaimseartha
This may be done by means of a general announcement
Is féidir é seo a dhéanamh le fógra ginearálta

When an employee is dismissed at the end of the contract the unfair dismissals legislation applies as normal unless the employer has availed of the provision to exclude the operation of the legislation

Nuair a bhristear fostaí as a bpost nuair a thagann an conradh chun críche, tá baint aige mar is gnáth leis an reachtaíocht um dífhostú éagórach mura bhfuil an fostóir ag baint leas as an fhoráil a chuireann oibriú an reachtaíocht ar neamhní
To avail of that provision, the employer must put the contract in writing
Chun an fhoráil a úsáid, caithfidh an fostóir an conradh a chur i scríbhinn

The employer must include a clause stating that the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977–2007 will not apply where the only reason for ending the contract is the expiry of the fixed term, or the completion of the specified purpose

Caithfidh an fostóir clásal a chur isteach a deireann nach mbeidh aon bhaint ag na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach 1977–2015 más é an t-aon fháth gur cuireadh deireadh leis an gconradh ná críochnú an dáta, nó go bhfuil tasc áirithe curtha i gcrích
Both the employer and the employee must sign the contract
Caithfidh an fostóir agus an fostaí an conradh a shíniú
An employee who has worked continuously for at least 104 weeks under a fixed-term or specified purpose contract may qualify for a redundancy payment when the contract ends
Má oibríonn fostaí ar feadh 104 seachtain le conradh ar théarma seasta, nuair tá an conradh críochnaithe d'fheadfadh go mbeidh íocaíocht iomarcaíochta ar fáil don fhostaí
Renewal of fixed-term contracts
Athnuachan conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta
Employees may not be employed on a series of fixed-term contracts indefinitely
Ní féidir le fostaithe a bheith fostaithe le conradh ar théarma seasta gan chrioch
There are 2 possible situations where this arises as follows:
Tá dhá chás ann a bhféadfadh sé seo tarlú:

• If an employee whose employment started before 14 July 2003 has completed 3 years’ continuous service as a fixed-term employee, the employer may renew their fixed-term contract only once for a period of no more than 1 year

• Nuair atá 3 bliana fostaíochta leanúnacha curtha isteach ag a leithéid de fhostaí a thosaigh mar fostaí ar théarma seasta roimh 14ú Iúl 2003 ní fhéadfadh an fostóir an conradh téarma seasta a athnuachan ach ar ócáid amháin, sin uile
• If an employee whose employment started after 14 July 2003 has been employed on 2 or more continuous fixed-term contracts, the total duration of those contracts may not exceed 4 years
• Nuair atá fostaí fostaithe ag an fostóir tar éis 14ú Iúl 2003 ar dhá nó níos mó conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta leanúnacha, ní chóir go mbeadh téarma comhiomlán na conarthaí níos faide ná 4 bliana
After this, if the employer wishes to renew the employee’s contract, it must be an open-ended contract unless there are objective grounds justifying the renewal of the contract for a fixed term only
Nuair nach gcomhlíonann athnuachan an chonartha ar théarma seasta leis na riachtanais seo agus nuair nach féidir é a mhíniú go hoibiachtúil, glactar leis mar chonradh neamhiata
The Unfair Dismissal Acts 1977–2015 contain a provision aimed at ensuring that successive temporary contracts are not used in order to avoid that legislation
Tá foráil san tAcht um Dífhostú Éagórach 1977–2007 a bhfuil sé mar aidhm aigea chinntiú nach n-úsáidtear conarthaí leantacha sealadach chun reachtaíocht a sheachaint
Where a fixed-term or specified-purpose contract expires and the individual is re-employed within 3 months, the individual is deemed to have continuous service
Nuair a éagann conradh sainchuspóra nó conradh ar théarma seasta agus tá an duine ath-fhostaithe laistigh de 3 mhí, glactar leis go bhfuil an duine ar sheirbhís leanúnach oibre

Therefore, even where an employer excludes the unfair dismissals legislation in the manner described above, an adjudicator of the Workplace Relations Commission will consider whether the use of such contracts was wholly or partly to avoid the employee having the protection of the unfair dismissals legislation

Mar sin, fiú má tá fostóir ag cuir an reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach as an áireamh sa gcaoi a chuirtear síos air thuas, rialóidh breithneoir an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre an bhfuiltear ag úsáid na conarthaí seo chun cosaint an fhostaí faoin reachtaíocht um dífhostú éagórach a sheachaint

If it is considered that this was the case and the contracts were not separated by more than 3 months and the job was at least similar, then the case can be dealt with as if there was continuous employment and the employer will be required to justify the dismissal in the normal manner

Má rialaítear go raibh sé sin amhlaidh agus nach raibh bearna de 3 mhí nó níos mó idir na conarthaí agus go raibh na postanna cosúil le chéile, is féidir déileáil leis an gcás ar nós go raibh fostaíocht leanúnach i gceist agus beidh ar an fostóir an dífhostú a mhíniú ar an ngnáth bhealach
Claims under the Protection of Employees (Fixed-Term Work) Act 2003 or for unfair dismissal may be brought using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie
Is féidir éilimh faoin Acht um Chosaint Fostaithe 2003 nó do dhífhostú éagórach a chur tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
An employer is prohibited from victimising a fixed-term employee who seeks to avail of rights under the Protection of Employees (Fixed-Term Work) Act 2003
Tá cosc ar an fostóir íospairt a dhéanamh ar fhostaí atá ar chonradh téarma seasta atá ag iarraidh a chearta faoin Acht um Chosaint Fostaithe 2003
Victimisation includes dismissal in order to avoid a fixed-term contract being considered an open-ended contract
Luaitear íospairt le dífhostú chun go seachnófaí conradh téarma seasta a thomhais mar chonradh neamhiata

For further information you can read the explanatory leaflet on Protection of Employees (Fixed-Term Work) Act 2003 (pdf) or you can contact the Workplace Relations Commission's Information and Customer Service - see 'Where to apply' below. Where to apply Workplace Relations Commission Information and Customer Service O'Brien Road Carlow R93 W7W2 Ireland Opening Hours: Mon. to Fri
